      void ResourceManager.loadResource(Resource res, java.lang.String key)
      Loads a resource by the key key.
      void ResourceManager.loadResources(Resource[] resources, java.lang.String key)
      Loads multiple resources, simply concatinating "_n" to the key with each new one, n being the number of resources processed.
